text:
Ionuț Silaghi de Oaș, Count de Szilágyi-Oaș (born March 16, 1990) is a Romanian singer, songwriter, producer, collector of folk music, author, aristocrat, economist, engineer and entrepreneur. He is the current head of the Szilágyi-Oaș noble family and the current Secretary General of "Ansamblul Oaşul". He is a graduate of the Technical University of Cluj-Napoca and of the Babeş-Bolyai University. He also completed a master's degree at the Technical University of Cluj-Napoca.
Career.
Ionuț Silaghi de Oaș is also a member of Broadcast Music, Inc. and of SoundExchange.
